ComicInfo.Series: Red Agent: Island of Dr. Moreau
ComicInfo.Summary:
After being hunted on land and at sea by Moreauâ€™s hybrid creatures, Red and Avril have had enough. With the help of the more sympathetic hybrids, they manage to restore their powers, and turn the tables on their pursuers. And now they must face down Moreau herself, in the explosive climax of the series.
